detail_desc: Seamless sports bra in fast-drying fabric with removable inserts, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide, ribbed trim at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Mesh trainers with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Shimmering, holographic section at the heels, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Short, fitted dress in jersey containing glittery threads with a foil print. Round neckline, an open section with wrapover sides at the back, and long sleeves. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey containing glittery threads with a foil print. Round neckline, an open section with wrapover sides at the back, and long sleeves. Unlined.

Short, off-the-shoulder top in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with broderie anglaise, long sleeves and narrow elastication around the top, cuffs and hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with broderie anglaise, long sleeves and narrow elastication around the top, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in airy, shimmering metallic jersey with a draped neckline at the front and rounded elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back. Lined.
Short, sleeveless lace dress in a narrow cut at the top with a cut-out section at the back, a covered button at the back of the neck and short, narrow shoulder straps. Partly lined.
Short, sleeveless lace dress in a narrow cut at the top with a cut-out section at the back, a covered button at the back of the neck and short, narrow shoulder straps. Partly lined.

Short shorts in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and rounded hems.
Short shorts in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and rounded hems.
Short shorts in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and rounded hems.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose crêpe weave. High waist with a small frill trim at the top and decorative tie belt.

Body in soft microfibre with lace details in a straight cut at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Partially covered in lace at the back, high cut legs, a lined gusset and a string back.

Strapless bandeau bra in microfibre and lace with padded cups that lift and shape the bust, side support and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Elastic hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the front.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a wide, detachable tie belt, pleats at the front, a zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners and side pockets.

Waist bag in fabric with a mesh back, zip at the top, zipped outer compartment and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Two mesh inner compartments. Lined. Size 8x15x30 cm.
Calf-length dress in heavily draping jersey crêpe with a V-neck and wrapover top. Short, flared sleeves, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a wide, circular skirt. Unlined.

Running jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Loose yoke at the back with a concealed, ventilating mesh section, long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, side pockets and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Reflective details. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Cap in cotton twill with a glittery print on the front and ties at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top and short sleeves with ribbed trims.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top and short sleeves with ribbed trims.
Sleeveless tulle dress with a double-layered lace bodice, narrow satin shoulder straps that cross at the back and pearly buttons at the back. Skirt with two layers of tulle to create width. Lined.

Knee-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-shaped opening at the front with tasselled ties at the top. Yoke with pleats, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.

Pyjamas in a soft, patterned viscose weave. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and short slits at the sides of the hem.

Wide, ankle-length trousers in a crêpe weave with a high, frill-trimmed, elasticated waist and concealed pockets in the side seams.

Gently tailored jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a covered button at the front and jetted front pockets. 3/4-length sleeves with a decorative button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
